head.supplied: The Free German Academy ¶ for Sciences, Arts and General Culture in ¶ Goethe's Parental Home ¶ to Dr. phil. Ferdinand Baron von Mueller Mr F.D.H. ¶ Academician, Director of the Zoological and Botanic...

div.p: Freies Deutsches Hochstift Frankfurter Goethemuseum, Frankfurt am Main.

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: center;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; margin-left: 0.3335in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: -0.3335in; font-size: 9pt;

note.p: Letter not found; MS is a file copy kept by the Academy. MS annotation: '728/7778 Abscrift versandt: 14/III 1878' [Copy sent 14 March 1878].

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: center;
p.seg: für Wissenschaften, Künste und allgemeine Bildung in

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: center;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt;

div.p: an Herrn Dr. phil. Ferdinand Baron von Mueller Mr F D H. Akademiker, Direktor des Zoologischen u. Botanischen Gartens d. Z. Stiftsrath des freien Deutschen Hochstiftens Melbourne (Australien)

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: end;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt;

div.p: Unter Bescheinigung des Empfanges Ihrer geehrten Zuschrift und Sendung vom (Poststempel 24/1/d.J. uns Ihres gütigst mitgetheilten Vortrags On the Advancement of the Natural Sciences through Ministers of the Christian Church erfreuend, danken wir Ihnen verbindlichst und bitten um Erhaltung Ihres ferneren gütigen Wohlwollens für unsere Stiftung.

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;

cell.style: padding-left: 0.0556in; padding-right: 0.0556in; padding-top: 0in; padding-bottom: 0in; border: none;

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: center;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: center;

cell.style: padding-left: 0.0556in; padding-right: 0.0556in; padding-top: 0in; padding-bottom: 0in; border: none;

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: center;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: center;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: center;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: center;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt;

div.p: Mit verehrungsvollsten Grüssen und innigsten Dank für Ihren freundlichen Zeilen und Ihr herzlichen Theilnehmen.

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 10pt; text-align: center;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 10pt; text-align: center;

div.p: for Sciences, Arts and General Culture in

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 10pt; text-align: center;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 10pt;

div.p:
to Dr. phil. Ferdinand Baron von Mueller Mr F.D.H.
Meister des Freies Deutsches Hochstiftes [Master of the Free German Academy]. Academician, Director of the Zoological and Botanical Garden at present Councillor of the Free German Academy, Melbourne (Australia)

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 10pt; text-align: end;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 10pt;

div.p:
Under certification of receipt of your esteemed consignment (postmarked 24 January this year) of your kindly-sent lecture On the Advancement of the Natural Sciences through Ministers of the Christian Church
B77.13.05.
gratifyingly we thank you kindly and request support of your further kindly goodwill for our foundation.

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in; font-size: 10pt;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in; font-size: 10pt;

cell.style: padding-left: 0.0556in; padding-right: 0.0556in; padding-top: 0in; padding-bottom: 0in; border: none;

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 10pt; text-align: center;

cell.p:
V.
Dr G. H. Otto Volger.

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 10pt; text-align: center;

cell.style: padding-left: 0.0556in; padding-right: 0.0556in; padding-top: 0in; padding-bottom: 0in; border: none;

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 10pt; text-align: center;

cell.p:
Dr. A. P.
Dr Adolf Petermann.

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 10pt; text-align: center;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 10pt; text-align: center;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 10pt; text-align: center;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 10pt;

div.p: With reverential greetings and sincere thanks for your kind lines and your hearty participation.
